alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 11:05PM CDT until November 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in south central Arkansas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1105 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Highland Industrial Park to near Lisbon to 9 miles northeast of Homer, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Smackover, Norphlet, Huttig, Junction City, Strong, Calion, Wesson, Lisbon, Urbana, Lawson, Lapile, Moro Bay State Park, Felsenthal, Newell, New London, Pigeon Hill, Kenova, Catesville and Hew Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Arkansas.
